titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Giles G. Bole's sophomore pathology lecture notes and lab write-ups

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Giles G. Bole's sophomore pathology lecture notes and lab write-ups

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Giles Boles was acting dean of the University of Michgian Medical School in 1990; Boles served as dean of Medical School in 1991-1996.
archdesc.scopecontent: A bound volume containing Bole's pathology lecture notes and lab write-ups as a sophomore.
